name: Topics in History
description: An in-depth examination of historical issues. Content in any given year depends on instructor. See History website for more details.
prerequisites: 14.0 FCEs including 2.0 FCE HIS course. Further pre-requisites vary from year to year, consult the department.
exclusions: Students may not take both L0601 ("Critical Histories of the Black Canadian Experience") and L0701 ("Race in Canada") offered in 2016-17 Fall/Winter.
